reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We picked this based on past tripadvisor reviews and we were not disappointed. It's #1 for a reason. We stayed in large front room which was clean and spacious as past guest advised. It also had benefit of balcony over front of house which is a sun trap in the mornings. Ian is a great host, dry sense of humour, very welcoming and helpful. Ok bed is not made - not a problem and if it is stay elsewhere. Breakfast is help yourself & put dishes in dishwasher, but plenty of choice. Simply not pretentious but everything we needed and a great location. Fridge available to share with other guests outside room.
reviews.title: Excellent location, super host, fantastic B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ian will do anything asked and has a wealth of knowledge of good local restaurants etc. About a 30 minute walk to Federation Square or 20 mins to centre of city but trams available from 5+ mins if that is preference.
reviews.title: Great B+B close to the city

reviews.text: Ian has pretty much 100% occupancy which says it al and at rates well below all others by keeping things simple. Excellent.
reviews.title: A gorgeous gem
Loved this property and the owners*
reviews.text: I hope that this is the start of similar accommodation experiences as we now travel first down Great Ocean Road to Port Campbell then back via Melbourne up to Blue Mountains and then Sydney. We will report all on trip advisor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at Ian's lovely B+B for 5 fantastic nights.
reviews.title: great home from home
